original_text: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 우리가 보고 들은 바를 너희에게도 전함은 너희로 우리와 사귐이 있게 하려 함이니 우리의 사귐은 아버지와 그의 아들 예수 그리스도와 더불어 누림이라

sentences.original_text: That which we have seen and heard
that ye also may have fellowship with us
and truly our fellowship is with the Father
sentences.korean_translation: 과연 우리의 교제는 아버지와 함께 있고

sentences.original_text: and with his Son Jesus Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아들 예수 그리스도와 함께 함이라
